description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS, Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCA Factor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering, Project

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種運籌系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運籌系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的均衡分析。課程內容包含：網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡指派、動態網路分析、以及商用車輛營運管理與車輛路線問題等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the models and algorithms for logistics system analysis. In addition to discussing the supply and demand sides of logistics systems, this course aims to analyze the equilibrium between supply and demand. The main topics include, but not limited to, network design, analysis, and optimization, queueing theory, network equilibrium assignment, dynamic network analysis, and commercial vehicle operation and vehicle routing and scheduling.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

name.en: Case Study of Corporate Merger & Acquisition

description.zh: 本課程個案研究目標公司包括科技公司與金融機構，可能牽涉之法律有：企業併購法、公司法、證券交易法、金融機構合併法、金融控股公司法、勞動基準法等。本課程主要內容有1.概括併購政策議題。 2.併購交易的財務結構、會計、評價與法律議題。
description.en: This course covers several topics: 1. General policy issues surrounding mergers and acquisitions. 2. The financial structuring of the deal, accounting issues, valuation, and legal issues.

notes: 由國巨律師事務所幸大智律師共同授課,限北區5人

name.zh: 智慧財產權商品化應用

description.zh: 本課程主要內容有1.智財權組合2.商品化考慮因素3.商品化過程
description.en: This course will emphasize on 1. Combination of intellectual properties 2. Factors affect the commercialization process and 3. Commercialization process.

name.zh: 智慧財產權服務業商業模式
name.en: Business Model of Intellectual Property Service Industry

description.zh: 智慧財產權的應用由於NPE之興起，引起全世界的重視，歐美大公司視為未來重要策略。為了培養本國智慧財產權服務業，本課程將探討國際上近年來興起的智慧財產權各種商業模式，評估其優劣點及台灣可能發展應用之方向。
description.en: The application of intellectual property is a hot topic internationally. Especially, the rising of NPE litigation or other legal practices. In order to bring up the service industry of intellectual property in Taiwan. This course will emphasize the business model of intellectual property service industry worldwide. Comparison and application between Taiwan and other countries will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程將探討互動科技運用於當代表演藝術之可能性與相關發展，並介紹互動表演形式與美學、電腦視覺與電腦聆聽、即時影像處理、即時音訊合成等，並藉由實際展演計畫之提案與執行，透過跨領域合作，讓學生有機會將互動科技與表演藝術結合。「互動表演藝術 II」將注重表演計畫之實際執行、跨界合作之溝通與協調、即時互動影像設計、時序設計、相關軟硬體設置、與實際排練。
description.en: This course will explore the potential of incorporating interactive technology in performing arts and will also review the existing repertoire. In addition, topics about the form, the aesthetics of interactive performing arts, computer vision, computer listening, real-time video processing, and real-time audio synthesis will also be covered. Students will be asked to bring forth their proposal of interactive performing arts and to realize their work through formal presentation combining interactive technology and performing arts. "Interactive Performing Arts II" will deal mainly with proposal realization, interdisciplinary cooperation, real-time interactive video design, sequential design, equipment setup, and rehearsal arrangement.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹準則作曲的概念與技巧、並教導使用 Max/MSP/Jitter 物件導向程式設計工具，來設計準則作曲系統與即時音訊處理工具。主要內容將包含：準則作曲程式設計、即時音訊之播放與錄音系統設計、音色合成與再合成、數位效果器之設計。此外，本課程亦將介紹音訊偵測與分析技巧。學生將被要求以 Max/MSP/Jitter 設計聲音裝置、互動音樂展演系統、或音樂教學程式，透過實作來學習音樂、音訊相關的程式設計。
description.en: This course will focus upon algorithmic composition and real-time audio processing using object-oriented programming language Max/MSP/Jitter. Subjects including algorithmic composition, real-time audio recording, playback, synthesis, re-synthesis, and effects will be covered. Techniques about audio detection and analysis will also be introduced. Students will be asked to build a system with Max/MSP for sound installations, real-time interactive music, or music pedagogy.

description.zh: 本課程著重於高級聽力與口說能力之培養，使學生之聽講能力訓練進階至主題式的學習. 教材提昇至多元化之主題，包括商業、貿易、法律、政治、社會、文化、觀光等層面。教法上強調生動的多媒體輔助與高效的演練，針對以上教材主題，訓練學生聽取他人語言意涵及口語表達能力。此外，希望藉由此訓練，培養學生學習的策略，進而對自我學習產生負責的態度。
description.en: This course is designed to better students' listening and speaking skills; to accelerate their vocabulary build-up and application to relevant topics, and to encourage their familiarity with the sophisticated, various, and contemporary themes.  Materials used include socio-cultural realities of economics, business, politics, tourism, and family life. This class stresses global comprehension and attention to discrete points-such as paralinguistic aspects or accents. Activities encompass oral presentations, group discussion, collaborative project and self-report. Students are guided to work out strategies for themselves and are encouraged to adopt a certain responsibility for their own learning.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 商業與科技的日新月異乃現代生活之重要標的，本課程選讀書報雜誌中有關經貿企管等商業論述，以及科技資訊等相關文章，以討論方式，引導學生進入現代工商科技化的英語環境。
description.en: This course will guide students to read articles on technology and business from a variety of sources (books, magazines, newspapers, television scripts, etc.)  Students are required to actively participate in the speaking activities in the classroom which may involve group discussion and oral presentation of a specific topic.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

description.zh: 為什麼要閱讀或研究莎士比亞? Catherine Belsey 回答道：是為了莎翁的獨特性。如她所言：「莎士比亞不僅是英語世界上流社會文化的精華，亦為其整體文化的精髓。」因為莎劇的辭彙，迄今仍通用於英語世界，並已融入日常生活之結構中。這現象不僅發生在現在的英國，自莎翁的時代開始，莎翁的語彙在全世界就從未停止流通過。何況，莎翁震撼人心的詩歌和劇場藝術，無人出其右的人性掌握，以及非凡的人生哲學思維與洞見，向來受到世人的珍愛。如世人常謂：莎士比亞的語言可觸發我們的想像力，為我們在人生的各個層面(包括職業層面)提升溝通效率。為了這些重要的理由，本課程將引導學生欣賞莎士比亞的若干劇作。
description.en: Why Shakespeare? Catherine Belsey answers that it is because of his singularity. As she observes, "Shakespeare is part and parcel of English-speaking culture, and not only high culture." For "phrases from the plays are still current, woven into the fabric of everyday life" in Britain now and have, in fact, been circulated in the world since the early modern era. Besides, Shakespeare has been cherished for his powerful poetry and stagecraft, his nonpareil grasp of human nature, and his remarkable philosophical insights into life. As people often observe, Shakespeare may trigger our imagination with his language and promote effective communication in every aspect of our life, including that of our careers. For these important reasons, this course aims to guide students to appreciate Shakespeare by focusing on a number of his plays.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。培養學生簡易西文的溝通能力，提供學生西文的基礎知識(包括字母、讀音、語法等)，並增進學生對西班牙文化的認識與興趣。本課程分為(一)和(二)兩部分進行(各三學分)。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language. By keeping their interests in studying Spanish, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of Spanish language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding of Spanish culture. The course is divided into two parts: Part 1 (Fall Semester), Part 2 (Spring Semester), three credits involved in each semester.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en: The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

description.zh: 本課程之宗旨在於讓學生全盤瞭解現代化空間資訊、掌握空間資訊自動化研究方向、提供專業擴展及實力培養、並開創研究和就業格局。課程內容包含：一、空間資訊簡介、二、航測及遙測概要、三、地理資訊系統概要、四、全球定位系統簡介、五、數碼城市簡介。
description.en: The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include: 1) Introduction (geoinformatics at a glance), 2) Remote Sensing (remote sensing fundamentals, airborne remote sensing, and satellite remote sensing), 3) Geographic Information Systems (GIS), 4) Global Positioning System (GPS), 5) Cyber City Implementation and Applications.

description.zh: 邊坡破壞之型態、分類、誘因與力學行為之探討，邊坡穩定分析之方法與理論，邊坡穩定處理對策略與防治方法之探討，邊坡滑動地層之監測、鑽探取樣與試驗分析。
description.en: This course covers various methods of slope stability analyses; selection of methods of analysis and strength parameters;field investigation for landslide problems; design strategies; landslip preventive and protective measures; and slope monitoring systems.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生基本專業設計程式之寫作技巧，及應用現成專業套裝軟體達到輔助設計之能力，使學生能將專業之設計以電腦輔助來完成。
本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 土木營造工程範圍廣泛，各種法營造工法更是不計其數，本課程教授學生幾種常見之施工法：一、土方工程：1.土壤調查2.挖方3.填方4.搬運5.軟弱地盤之處理6.土方作業計劃7.作業能力估算。二、混凝土工程：1.混凝土材料及其性質2.配比設計3.混凝土之攪料、灌置與搗實4.混凝土之養護與品質控制。三、基礎工程：1.基礎之種類2.淺基礎3.樁基礎4.沈箱5.深開挖及擋土工程6.圍堰7.灌漿。四、專項工程：1.河川工程2.海岸工程3.堰埧工程4.發電工程5.隊道工程6.橋梁工程7.港灣工程8.道路工程9.衛生下水道工程10. 鐵路工程11. 地下構造物工程12. 建築工程13. 機場工程。
description.en: public work,improving the land and the enviorment,and preventing the harricoms.Construction Methods includes elementary and applied methods.The purposes of this course are for students understanding the steps of various construction methods.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 本課程包含工程繪圖基本觀念與電腦輔助繪圖技能，從2D繪圖到3D空間觀念的基本圖學觀念，引導學生瞭解工程圖的原理與重要性，進而帶領學生操作電腦輔助繪圖軟體與3D視覺化呈現，並以工程案例，培養其對工程的素養與獲取相關證照的基本能力。
description.en: This course instructs the spatial concepts of basic 2D/3D and projection methods, facilitating students to understand the principles and importance of engineering drawings. This course guides students to manipulate modern computer-aided design software and generate 3D rendered visualization, for the fundamental capabilities on acquiring related licenses.

notes: 計網電腦教室,四土二甲乙合開,限39人

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。

資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

name.en: Special Topic on Chemical Technological Industry

description.zh: 探討國內化工業科技產業，包括能源、環保、資訊、生技等與化工技術密切相關之產業。
description.en: The discussions on the chemical technological industry in Taiwan which includes Energy, Environmental Protection, Information Technology, Biochemistry Technology and so on that closely related to the chemical technology.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子奈米複合材料之基本原理、製備加工、結構形態與其特殊物理及化學性質，並討論其應用及發展趨勢。
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles, synthesis approaches, processing techniques, morphology, characterization, and the unique chemical and physical aspects associated with polymer based nanocomposite materials. It will also describe the applications and the development of high performance materials as well as future directions for research in the field.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙合開;修課人數限35人

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

notes: 四化四乙丙合開;修課人數限40人

description.zh: 介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。1. 高分子物理及化學性質2. 高分子光電特性3. 功能性高分子4. 液晶高分子5. 薄膜技術與應用6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物7. 高分子導體及半導體8. 光電用高分子9. 高分子電池10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開;修課人數限50人

description.zh: 生物質量(biomass)是指各類有機物質的質量，是太陽能經由光合作用或其他機制以化學能形式貯存於生物體中的能量，這一類貯存於動植物的化學能量通稱為生質能源(bioenergy or biomass energy)。生質能源是一種再生能源，與風能、太陽能、地熱等一樣具有用之不竭的特性。生物質量在能源上的應用可稱為生質能源技術(bioenergy technology)，包括兩大發展方向，其一為生質燃料(biofuels)，亦即將生物質轉變為燃料，如生質酒精、生質柴油、與methyl tertiary butyl ether (MTBE)等，主要應用於交通運輸用燃油之替代燃料；其二為用作生質電力(biopower)，包括直接燃燒生質物並配合氣體渦輪(gas turbine)來產生電能，或是將生物質以醱酵技術轉換成氣體燃料(如氫氣或甲烷)或液體燃料(如醇類)，再配合燃料電池(fuel cells)應用於電力之產生。生質能源技術為包含跨領域之技術整合，包含現代生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖(genetic cloning)、醱酵控制、與生物觸媒(biocatalysis)技術等。在很多情況下亦必須配合熱裂解之生物質處理或生質精煉(biorefinery)程序，以達成不同的生物質量產物之轉化與純化。
description.en: This is an introductory course to bioenergy which deals with bioenergy properties,production and logistics as well as biofuel upgrading processes,combustion/gasification and environmental aspects.The main goal is to introduce students to bioenergy sources and related biotechnology for the production of biofuels and bioproducts.The student will get an overview of available biomass resources,knowledge of basic methods of bioenergy use,and the possibilities for bioenergy use today and in the future.Furthermore,this course will provide the experience in various bioenergy including liquid biofuels(such as biodiesel,bioethanol,and MTBE),solid biofuels(wood and grass bioenergy),and biogas(the farm-based bioenergy).The course will provide the students the biofuel-related science and technology,the background and literature information regarding to the environmental,economical,and social issues,as well as other biofuel-related development such as genetic cloning,biocatalysis, and biorefinery.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開;修課人數限50人

description.zh: 目標在協助學生瞭解清潔技術與化學災害與污染物形成原因及應變技術。主要內容包含：化工製程、化學災害與污染物形成、清潔技術、污染防治技術、環境管理、案例探討等。
description.en: The objective of this couse is to help student understand the clearner production technology, chemical hazard, the formation of pollutant and technology. The course includes chemical process, chemical hazard and the formation of pollutant, clearner technology, pollution prevention technology, environmental management, etc.

notes: 四化二甲乙丙合開;修課人數限50人

description.zh: 化工概論是一門針對進入化工領域之初學者，提供全面性介紹的課程，引導學生瞭解化學工程的內容及未來的化工生涯，並介紹我國化工業的現況及未來展望。此外，本課程還提供許多專業以外的知識,以加強一個化學工程師的訓練。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamentals of chemical Engineering Courses will help students realize the various applications chemical engineering and the future carrier development. The course will also provide the professional knowledge and intensive training on chemical engineers.

description.zh: 化工概論是一門針對進入化工領域之初學者，提供全面性介紹的課程，引導學生瞭解化學工程的內容及未來的化工生涯，並介紹我國化工業的現況及未來展望。此外，本課程還提供許多專業以外的知識,以加強一個化學工程師的訓練。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamentals of chemical Engineering Courses will help students realize the various applications chemical engineering and the future carrier development. The course will also provide the professional knowledge and intensive training on chemical engineers.

notes: 四化一丙和四工程一合開

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

notes: 四材三乙和四材四乙合開

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

notes: 四材三乙和四材四乙合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹能源種類、能源物質之處理、工業能源之轉換方法及設備，以及能源之配送及使用等基礎概念。

description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts regarding the aerial photogrammetry and remote sensing. The production of DTM and interpretation of aerial photos and satellite images are included.

notes: 四材三乙和四材四乙合開

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 本學科對於再生、非再生資源以及資源再生之現象作一整體性的介紹，並配合原理及實例的講授，以期能對於工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的低價值物料，經由處理而加以回收利用，避免資源的浪費。
description.en: Introduction the recycle of resources.

description.zh: 環境地質學是資源探採及地質工程的專業課程；透過環境地質的調查與研究，以了解自然資源之使用與工程相關之地質問題。內容包括：水、土壤、礦產資源、能源開發、認識地質作用對人類生存環境的影響、認識自然災害，瞭解人為破壞引起的災害、地質環境改變、人類衛生環境的影響及各種廢料處理等。並介紹環境地質圖、山崩潛感圖、土地利用潛力圖等環境地質學研究方法。
description.en: Environmental geology is a professional course of resource exploration, extraction and geological engineering; through investigation and study of the geological environment, in order to understand the use of natural resources and the engineering geological problems. The contents include: water, soil, mineral resources, energy development, understanding of the geological environment for human survival and understanding of natural disasters, understand the human damage caused by disasters, changes in the geological environment, the environmental impact of human health and the various waste processing. And introduce the environmental geology research method : environmental geological maps, landslide susceptibility map, land-use potential map.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 本課程主要討論基本統計學與工程統計在紡織工業上之應用。其課程內容包括有統計資料之量測，統計資料之敘述，機率，隨機變數之分佈，非連續性機率分佈，參數評估，假說之測試，管制圖，迴歸及相關，變異數分析及如何使用統計套裝軟體均被包括於此課程中。
description.en: This course is concerned with the study of the basic statistics and engineering statistical applications in textile industries. The materials in this course, including statistical measures of data, statistical description of data, probability, distributions of random variables, discrete probability distributions, estimation of parameters, tests of hypotheses, control chart, regression and correlation, analysis of variance and how to use the statistical application software will be covered.

description.zh: 研究複合材料原理及應用，複合材料之高分子科學，預浸料，模壓料，壓力釜成型與真空袋技術，繞線成型，編織成型，熱可塑複合材料，拉擠成型及複合材料力學及應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to learn the principle of composite and its application.  Several composite processing methods are included.They are prepregs, molding compounds, autoclave and vaccum bag method.  Filament winding, braiding, thermoplastic composite, pultrusion are also included.  Finally, mechanic of composite and its application are discussed in detaile.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。

X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

description.zh: 介紹光纖構造及光在光纖內的特性參數，包括模態偏極態等；介紹光纖系統的光源、偵測器等主動元件，及藕合器、連接器等被動元件；介紹光纖網路及光纖元件，包括分波多工器等的原理；介紹調變、放大、雜訊等光纖控制、偵測子系統。課程內容包括：1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖特性參數介紹 3.光在光纖內的傳播 4.光纖模態 5.光源 6.光偵測器 7.藕合器、連接器 8.光纖元件-分波多工器 9.調變 10.雜訊與偵測。
description.en: 1 Introduction to the optical fiber system, 2 Parameters of the optical fiber, 3 Propagation of light inside optical fiber, 4 Modes of optical fiber, 5 Optical sources for optical fiber system, 6 Detectors for the optical fiber system, 7 Couplers and connectors 8 Introduction to DWDM, 9 Modulation, 10 Noise and Detection.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科技系基本課程之一。從基本的原子鍵結開始介紹，再導入晶體的結構，此部份包含完美的晶體及晶體的缺陷等。加強有關光電材料的介紹，如電性、光的性質、半導體材料及磁性材料等。祈使學生在進入光電領域前，對光電材料有一充分的認識。
description.en: Materials Science is one of the elementary courses of Department of Photonics. We begin to introduce the basic concepts of the atomic bonding then introduce the crystalline structure, here include perfect crystals and crystal defects. We will enhance about introducing the materials of electronic, optical, and magnetic. It will help the students can recognize the materials of electro-optic when he is going to electro-optic fields.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)光波導之模態、理論及製程技術，(2)光波導之損耗與光藕合，(3)光的調制原理及應用(包括各種主、被動元件)，(4)半導體雷射之原理、結構及製作，(5)光偵測器，(6)積體光學的應用與發展。
description.en: The following topics will be presented in this course: (1) guiding modes, theory and fabrication techniques of optical waveguide, (2)losses in optical waveguide and fundamentals of optical coupling, (3)principles and applications of optical modulations (including various passive and functional devices), (4)principles, structures, and fabrications of semiconductor lasers, (5)optical detectors, (6)applications of integrated optics and current trends.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 介紹日本設計思維與研究成果，包含日文中設計的相關詞語，藉由導讀與討論設計相關日文期刊雜誌與書籍体驗日本的設計思維。並透過課題演練以達到設計文化交流的積極意義。
description.en: N

name.zh: 消費者行為與產品設計

description.zh: 介紹消費者行為與產品設計之關係, 研究市場趨勢與消費者之消費相關之需求、心理、行為、及文化特性, 以進行產品開發之規劃並訂定設計策略。
description.en: Introduction to the relationships between consumer behavior and product design. The trends of markets and the consumption characteristics are studied to make the plan of product development and set up the design strategy.

description.zh: 本課程從民族性及文化進步的過程，探討家具之演化和人類生活環境變遷之關係，本課程特別著重在探討研究家具造形與建築樣式與建構之相互關係。
description.en: A general study of furniture evolution that is inspired by the change of living environment and culture evolution. The correlative factor between furniture form and architectural patterns is to be deliberating in the study.。

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

name.en: Management and leadership in technological colleges

description.zh: 分析當前技職校院內在、外在教育環境的衝擊，從理論及個案探討層面比較技職校院組織變革、經營模式、領導型態。
description.en: To analyze the changing of internal and external environment that impacts on technological colleges currently, and to discuss and compare ogranizational invovation models, the management and leadership styles among technological colleges from both theoretical and paractical aspects.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。

By working together and brainstorm to develop nature of design work and its management, quality by design, design in a business context, design policy making.

Meanwhile, discuss the essential knowledge of manufacturing engineer, Engineering Materials, Principles of Manufacturing Process, as Casting, Forming, Material-Removing, Joining and Surface Technology, Machine Tool Structures and its control Technologies, Automatic Production Systems, Metrology and Quality Control.

A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 室內空氣品質及室內空氣污染對人體之危害、空氣環境汙染物、換氣與通風、檢測方法、污染源診斷、空氣品質控制及改善、國內外法規、管理計劃規劃。含室內空氣污染物之移除技術、室內空氣清淨機原理應用於室內空氣品質之控制。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, air pollutants, fresh air and air conditioning & ventilation, indoor air quality control, management and regulation, indoor air cleaners.

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.　The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

name.zh: 行政程序法與行政訴訟法

description.zh: 行政程序法係為使行政行為遵循公正、公開與民主之程序，確保依法行政之原則，以保障人民權益，提高行政效能，增進人民對行政之信賴所制定之法律，其為行政機關辦理行政行為之基本法。行政訴訟法則提供司法救濟程序，保障人民權益，確保國家行政權之合法行使。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，強化同學對於行政程序法與行政訴訟法的認識，並培養同學準備相關國家考試的基礎。
description.en: Administrative Procedure Act is enacted to ensure that all administrative acts are carried out in pursuance of a fair, open and democratic process based on the principle of administration by law so as to protect the rights and interest of the people, enhance administrative efficiency and further the people's reliance on administration. dministrative Litigation Act  offers   judicial remedies procedure to  ensure  rights  of  the  people .The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Administrative Procedure Act and Administrative Litigation Act for the students and to equip them with a wider knowledge base for further national screening tests.

description.zh: 網路資源運用是現代人生的一部份，但不當利用網路或為犯罪工具的例子屢見不鮮，本課程擬探討網路誹謗、網路色情、駭客攻擊以及網路交際的安全性等，期望在個案的討論中培養學生正確利用網路資源的觀念，進一步落實法治教育。
description.en: To use internet resources is already part of the life for every modern people; however, the cases of using internet as the criminal tool are not rare. Thus, this course is going to discuss the law issues that are spread out from the application of internet, which including: internet slander, internet pornography. Hacker attack and electronic bank, electronic shopping, electronic business. Hope we can help our students to develop the right conception to use internet resources through case study, and further more to carry out the law education.

description.zh: 本課程分為Dreamweaver網頁設計、PHP與MySQL基礎，以及互動網頁設計等三部份。包括Dreamweaver的網頁圖文編輯、表格製作、超連結、分割框架、佈景主題應用、動態網頁、表單設計、網站的發佈與管理，以及PHP與MySQL環境設定、MySQL資料庫管理、SQL基本語法、PHP程式設計入門、用PHP存取MySQL等；讓同學有能力設計一個商業網站。
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. The is course composed of 3 parts:（1）Dreamweaver（2）PHP（3）MySQL data base.Learning how to build up the commercial website.

description.zh: 河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其免受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

notes: 博雅選修-自然,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 基礎知識與定義、大氣汙染、空氣汙染物、水文循環、水質處理、水汙染、固體廢棄物、大地汙染、噪音汙染、工業廢氣處理。
description.en: Basics and definitions, atmospheric and land pollutions, air pollurants, hydrology, water pollution and treatment, solid waste, noise pollution, industrial exhaust air treatment.

description.zh: 一、說明環境心理學的意義、發展背景、適用範圍及研究架構，並介紹環境心理學的方法論及在建築規劃設計上之運用；二、針對環境心理學與實質環境相關之重點課題，研討視覺美學、特性使用者活動行為模式、群居型態社交行為、空間場所性能體認等現象與實質設施需求之互動關係，並由實際案例之研討、模擬，以熟悉調查、觀察之操作。
1.建築管理行政體系及法源介紹。2.建築管理之對象人、事、物介紹。3.建築許可之申請、審核、核發、列管及追蹤作業。4.建築物之施工管理及工程糾紛處理。5.建築物使用與變更使用之管理。6.建築物昇降設備管理制度介紹。7.建築物違章之查報與拆除。8.建築物公共安全檢查法律依據及作業程序。9.建築管理的發展方向。10.建築師及營造業管理之基本概念及未來之工作方向。
description.en: 1.	Introducing the hierarchical of building department and government administration rules of the building.2.	Introducing administrative terms of building with owner, designer or supervisor of building, construction work, building site, and building itself.3.	Application procedure for a building permit, include application, judgement, approbation, management and audit.4.	Administration for Building construction and construction dispute intermediation.5.	Administration for building occupancy and alterations.6.	Introducing administration of building elevator facilities.7.	Illegal building administration and dismantling.8.	Inspection procedure for building safety and procedure rules.9.	The development direction of building administration.10.	The basic concept and executive direction in the future for administration of Architect and construction.

notes: 四建四和四創意四合開

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 文化資產保存在廿一世紀初的今天，已經是一個必須討?的課題。而在文化資產保存的相關課題?，建築保存的問題是非常繁複的一環，尤其一、二百??在西歐國家的討?與發展之下，建築?的文化資產保存已經發展出特定的概?與作法，即?在廿世紀下半?已經逐漸成熟的文化資產保存概?與??，將文化資產的定義重新進???視與界定，而使得文化資產的概?與對象變得多元，然而，建築保存與其再?用的課題仍然是文化資產保存課題下至為重要的一個重點。保存的目的，是為??史的?證，但是建築空間與建築體保存之後面?另外一個課題，即再?用的問題。被認定具備?史價值的建築，常常可能在建築的結構與規模上有使用的困難?，因而再?用的課題會是建築保存後所亟需面對。本課程將針對建築的保存、修?與再?用進?分析，以及透過保存與再?用案?的?型分析，討?各種空間再?用的可能性，也從上述的案??討?再?用手法的新空間與舊建築體之間的存在、物化的?史記憶，以及新與舊在同一棟建築?的辯證關係。
description.en: In this beginning of 21st Century, the preservation of cultural heritage becomes a necessary issue. Preservation of architecture is one of the most important works in this issue. Since one or two centuries, European has developed its appropriate concept and practice on the preservation of architectural heritage, which fit to their proper cultural context. Though the definition of cultural heritage has been reviewed and derived into some very rich aspects in the second half of 20th Century, the preservation and the rehabilitation of architecture keep its importance among the preservation issues of cultural heritage.The purpose of preservation is to witness history. We found big problem after having preserved architectural spaces and buildings themselves, which is the rehabilitation. Some buildings to be recognized of historical value and have been put in the process of protection could face some difficulties on reuse because of their spaces or structural limits. This is what a buildin

description.zh: 新興數位學習媒體的開發日新月異，再加上資訊存取的高效能數位化，使得科技輔助的數位學習之路更形寬廣、開闊。電子書於知識傳遞的介面上，扮演了關鍵性的角色。傳統上以行為理論推衍而來的人機介面學習模式已然過於狹隘，因為數位時代中的學習者角色已由被動轉為主動，由行為導向轉為認知導向、意義導向以及脈絡導向，而資訊的解讀與詮釋更從單一性、制式化轉為開放性、多元化。對於致力於創新數位學習科技的開發者而言，針對學習者的學習模式重新加以審視是極為迫切的，如此方能以嶄新的角度去開發新的學習潛能和發展性。本課程目的即是從心理學、認知科學及資訊處理的角度來探討新型數位學習模式以及其應用方法，並探討數位學習成效評估系統的建立方案，形塑電子書於知識鴻海的無限可能。
description.en: The rapid development of digital learning and emerging learning technologies, as well as effective information storage platforms, have made traditional learning theory insufficient and less productive in guiding instructional designs for contemporary educational development. New available learning technologies therefore call for the need to re-consider new learning theories. For that, the definitions and mechanism of learning and learners have become more multidimensional and open-ended, instead of being singular and standardized in conventional perception. For those who are devoted to create new technological applications for learning, it is no doubt critical to construct new mechanism of learning in current highly digitized era. This course will discuss relevant cognitive learning theories from research in psychology and education, and contemplate how new e-learning solutions can be evaluated.

name.en: Special Topics on Engineering Information Management

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 限100-1修過塑膠射出成形與模具實務之同學選課-限30人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002015或負責教授同意。認識標準與規範、規範的應用、軸承設計實務、密封裝置設計、移位齒輪、潤滑設計實務、旋轉機件的慣性及啟動問題、驅動元件之選用。
description.en: Introduction to Standards and Codes, Practice of Bearing Selection, Seal Design, Shifted Gears, Practice of Lubrication Design, Mass Moment of Inertia and flywheel effects, and Driving Device Selection.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

name.zh: 生技相關產業優良製造規範

description.zh: 由於人口老化、國民所得提高、醫療支出增加與各種流行性傳染病等相關議題，生技相關產業已被世界公認為二十一世紀最具發展潛力之產業。下一波台灣的高科技產業應著重於以發明與創新為主的產業，而生技相關產業正是我國決定要發展之重大新興產業。由於生技相關產業應用範圍廣，附加價值高，故為提升其產業競爭力且加速進入國際市場，國內生技相關產業除了須提升產品品質、加強國際化的管理之外，亦須通過各國所採用的認證制度。此外，政府如何建構一健全完善的法規管理制度，更是生技相關產業發展成功的必要條件。目前國內醫藥產品相關法規，包括藥事法、醫療器材優良製造規範（GMP）及藥品優良製造規範（cGMP）等。由於近年國內外細胞療法之迅速發展，且人體細胞組織物之管理操作與傳統藥品並非完全相同之原因，我國特別訂定人體細胞組織優良操作規範（Good Tissue Practice，GTP），其目的為預防因使用人體細胞組織物而導入、傳播及擴散傳染病，並期望協助機構確保其人體細胞組織物未含有傳染病病原，在製造過程中未受污染，且不致因製造不當而影響人體細胞組織物效用與完整性。
description.en: Biotechnology-related industry has been recognized as the most potential business in twenty-first century. The next step of Taiwan's high technology should focus on the invention and innovation-based industry, which biotechnology should be included. Medical technology is a high value-added, application-board industry. To enhance its competitiveness and speed up access to international markets, producers need to ensure the product quality, strengthen the international management, conformity the regulation in all different countries. At present, the relevant laws and regulations of pharmaceutical products include the followings: the Pharmaceutical Affairs Law, good manufacturing practice of medical device (GMP), pharmaceutical Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP) and the rapid development of cell therapy and the management of human cells and tissues (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) .

description.zh: 專題討論綠建築設計包括生物多樣性、綠化量、基地保水、水資源、日常節能、二氧化碳減量、廢棄物減量、室內環境、污水垃圾改善等評估指標內容以及其他有關綠建築設計手法，在創新設計的發想、理念、技術與案例。
description.en: The topic is discussed with green building assessment indicator including biodiversity, greenery, soil water content, daily energy saving, co2 emission reduction, indoor environment, water resource, sewage and garbage improvement, and other green building design method. To discuss about concept, principle, technique, case study for innovation design .

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討服務設計的屬性與特質，應用既存的設計工具與方法，發展適用於服務領域的設計架構．講述各項應用於設計發想與分析的工具，包括：touch points analysis，scenario planning，storyboards，Service Quality等．
description.en: Economic conditions have changed from a manufacturing society to an information- and service-based economy. Within Service Design, Service Interfaces are designed for intangible products that are, from the customer's point of view, useful, profitable and desirable. This course explores the process and framework of service design. The process of service design applies explorative, generative, and evaluative design approaches. Designers observe and interpret requirements and behavioral patterns and then visualize, formulate, and choreograph solutions to problems. Tools that help to accomplish a successful service design are introduced. The analysis of existing services examines whether touch points are correctly positioned. Scenario Planning starts with the development of the client journey as a schema by which service design can capture and illustrate the complete process of a service with its emotional, material and procedural components from a client's perspective. Storyboards illus

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: Theory and application of groundwater flow modeling,focusing on MODFLOW.Numerical methods.Discretization and boundaries.Parameterization and calibration.Problems and case-histories.

description.zh: 隨著資訊技術與網路科技的發展，促成了城市發展的新樣態。IBM公司在全球化背景下針對社會變遷、科技應用、綠能環保、及永續發展等問題，提出了「智慧城市」的新思維。在國際間也引發其研究與規劃的創新領域。台灣近幾年來為能達成「智慧台灣」的發展目標，並推動台灣的智慧城市及相關產業發展，經濟部技術處在2009年中成立了「經濟部智慧生活科技運用計畫推動辦公室」，以推動智慧生活科技運用計畫，除將帶動「智慧生活」產業的發展，也將師法國外典範進行「智慧城市」的規劃，打造台灣的智慧城市。本課程即在上述國家重大發展策略的架構下，引領建築與都市設計研究所的研究生，透過專論與實作的方式，探討未來「智慧城市」的思維，並透過與資訊科技跨領域知識的整合，融入智慧生活的需求，提出「智慧城市」規劃的架構、願景與策略。
description.en: This course introduces graduate students to the newly developed concept about the intelligent cities and how they are planned and implemented. The concept of intelligent city was proposed by the IBM with globalization background. It is a new and innovation research field, which include inter-discipline integration. The course is organized into two parts: Part1 explore the Basic which to form an intelligent city. It will start with classroom lecture, speech and paper reading and using intelligent cities case study around the world as references. We will examine the key components that form an intelligent city. Part2 will use a target community as a practical case study area and use people participation and community enforcement model to propose a prototype of an intelligent city will be. The results will be illustrated and presented to the local community.

description.zh: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容 :1.建築再利用之導論與定義； 2.建築再利用的主要理論與手法；3. 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討；4. 建築填充體的更新 ；5. 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築 主體的增建與減建；6.外部裝修的保存與再利用；7. 建築資材的他用途轉用；8.建築再利用與都市更新；9. 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the management of building projects, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.zh: 自動化系統設計與實習
name.en: Experiments and Design for Automatic Systems

description.zh: 培養理論與實務兼備之自動化工程專業人才，除課堂講授與強化實驗實習課程外，更提供應用微處理器之自動控制實務與實習:包含電子儀器之使用說明、虛擬儀表設計、Arduino單晶片之應用。使同學在自動化系統設計與機電整合等領域，加強實務能力。
description.en: Introduction to design for automatic system，control systems ，microchip，system on chip，virtual instruments and experiments for AD/DA, DIDO, and applications for automatic system.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

description.zh: 化工概論是一門針對進入化工領域之初學者，提供全面性介紹的課程，引導學生瞭解化學工程的內容及未來的化工生涯，並介紹我國化工業的現況及未來展望。此外，本課程還提供許多專業以外的知識,以加強一個化學工程師的訓練。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamentals of chemical Engineering Courses will help students realize the various applications chemical engineering and the future carrier development. The course will also provide the professional knowledge and intensive training on chemical engineers.

name.zh: 問題分析,解決技巧與實例演練
name.en: Problem analysis, solving skills and practice

description.zh: 本課程介紹分析問題、解決問題的工具及手法。包括：管理性問題、IE問題、發明性問題的分析與解決技法等。例如：腦力激盪法、IE及品管七大手法、演進趨勢分析法、九宮格分析法、因果鏈分析法…等。本課程以問題與案例為主題，實際帶領學員運用工具及手法，學習問題的分析與解決。
description.en: The objectives of "Problem Analysis & Solving Skills" course are to study the systematic methods of analyzing and solving problem. The topics of this course includes concepts and context about analyzing and solving management problem, IE problem, and inventive problem , for examples "Brain Storming"、"IE & QC 7 Methods"、"Trends Analysis"、"9 Windows Analysis"、"CEC Analysis"…etc.

notes: 四工三甲乙和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系?。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.To develop an understanding of data and decision analysis to help managers make better decisions in the presence of uncertainty.

notes: 四工三甲乙和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: (一)嘗試引導同學作相關設計研究，探索符合社會、人文的設計策略，以國際消費者趨勢、競爭者分析、科技趨勢、國際設計研究為依據，用清晰的思路作不同的市場定位。(二)培養同學觀察市場，了解資訊。以一設計師應有能力，發展出利基性產品的關鍵性因素分析報告。並探索不同族群之消費行為分析，作為加速產品開發流程及建立利基性產品之依據，可爭取商機及最大利潤。(三) 每位同學需完成團隊分析報告，與授課老師指定之其他作業。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop analysis skills on design trends in global context, including the sensibility and judgment of design style, design service, and design industry. Assignments include case studies other required reports.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.
