description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 「民事訴訟法」第一個部分，此部分旨在向修課同學作民事訴訟法之概括介紹，而此一介紹包含下列三個重點： 一、民事訴訟法之立法背景 二、民事訴訟法之理論 三、民事訴訟法之解釋方法 參與此部分乃理解民事訴訟法之關鍵一步，修課同學將受益匪淺。第二個部分，此部分會聚焦在民事訴訟法之細節上，尤其是下列三個重點：一、對於民事訴訟法之進一步闡述二、民事訴訟法於案例事實之適用三、民法與民事訴訟法之結合於此部分課程結束時，修課同學應有能力依據民事訴訟法來處理常見之民事法律問題。
description.en: “Civil Procedure Law” the first part of this course, is aiming to give participants a general introduction to the Civil Procedure Law, and the introduction contains the following three points: 1. The legislative background of the Civil Procedure Law. 2. The theories of the Civil Procedure Law. 3. The interpretive methods of the Civil Procedure Law. Attending the part is the critical step to understanding the Civil Procedure Law and benefits participants a lot.The second part of this course, is focusing on the details of the Civil Proce-dure Law, especially the following three points: 1. Further elucidation of the Civil Procedure Law.2. Application of the Civil Procedure Law to the facts.3. Combination of the Civil Law and the Civil Procedure Law.At the end of the part, participants are supposed to be able to deal with common civil legal problems according to the Civil Procedure Law.

description.zh: 科技的進步不僅利於人類文明的創新，也考驗當代法律制度是否能確保法正義的理念與法秩序的維持。本課程主要是探討我國與先進國家智慧財產權、公平交易法、消費者保護法、電子商務、網路犯罪與生物科技法律等問題。
description.en: The advance of technology facilitates an innovation of human civilization; in addition, it also proves to be a test of the modern legal system-seeing whether a balance between legal justice and legal order can be maintained. Some important topics available for class discussion are: intellectual property, fair trade law, consumer protection, e-commerce, internet crimes and biological technology.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習下列技術:低成本自動化，應用於自動化之元件與設備的認識，氣壓控制技術，可程式控制器，生產線機器連線整合控制實務，自動化生產技術。
description.en: This course provides students with the following technologies: low cost automation components, pneumatic control, programmable logic controller, the practical control of integrated production line, and automation production technology.

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗發明程序之實務，透過邀請國內著名之發明家進行專題講座，經由發明人之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生之發明學習動機，開發其發明之創意潛能，並習得發明相關之理論與技巧，作為未來成為發明家之基石。
description.en: This curriculum provides the student and the practical real exchange platform, assists the student to experience practice of the invention procedure, carries on the subject talks by the invitation domestic renowned inventor, shares experience of by way of the inventor and inherits, stimulates invention of academic motivation the student, develops creativity of potential its invention, and the custom results in theory and the skill the invention related, will become cornerstone of the inventor as the future.

name.zh: 高科技產業的專利糾紛

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程分兩學期授課，第一學期教授國際標準驗證ISO9001:2008，第二學期教授ISO14001:2004及OHSAS18001:2007。上完課程獲得學分外，並可參加第三者驗證機構考試獲得稽核員之證書。
description.en: This course is given lesson for two semesters. The content of first semester is ISO9001:2008, second semester is ISO14001:2004 andOHSAS18001:2007. Students can obtain the credit of this course and the certificate of auditor exam through third certification organization.

description.zh: 模內塗裝(IMD)技術是把塗裝薄膜(decorative film)預置在模具型腔(cavity)內，接著再將熔膠射入型腔內薄膜的內側，即可生產最後完成的零件且在零件表面覆上塗裝薄膜上的圖案。此製程廣泛應用在3C產品，對於增進產品外觀的表面塗裝，提供降低成本有效的方法，因為不需要作二次印刷。然而此一製程需要考慮額外的設備成本、塗裝薄膜材料生產、薄膜精確定位、與模具設計等。這門課對於機械系學生將來要從事產品開發、製程設計是一門非常重要的課程。
description.en: In-mold decoration (IMD) comprises insertion of a film or foil into the cavity, followed by injection of polymer melts on the inner side of the insert to produce a part with the final finish defined by the decorative film/foil. This process is used to produce 3C product, and provides a cost-effective way of surface decoration that enhances the appearance of product, because no post treatment is needed. However, this process must consider the extra additional equipment cost, decorative film material, film positioning, and mold design. This course is very important for a mechanical department student who works about product development and manufacturing process design in the future.

notes: 四機甲乙丙和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3001054或負責教授同意。介紹數值控制架構、作用及程式寫作、加工路徑處、進給系統、位置量測系統、適應控制系統、DNC-系統、彈性製造系統、生產資料搜集系統、自動化製造之機器自我診斷。
description.en: Basic Components of an Numerical Control (NC) System, Applications of NC Machine, NC Motion Control System, Control Loop Unit, Data Processing Unit, NC Machine Programming, Coordinate Measuring Equipment, Direct Numerical Control System (DNC), Adaptive Control Machining System & Flexible Manufacturing System.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於瞭解現今建築界之新興行業，邀請各新興行業負責人或主管來講授其實務及就業準備，藉以了解建築新興行業之就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: This course invites directors from the architecture venture business. The course might also organize field trips to allow the participants to know the status quo and the required knowledge and skills of the architecture venture business.

notes: 四建三和最後一哩合開,上三ABC節

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: TOEIC限50人外加北區跨校5人,共同選修,不列入畢業學分

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代設計師在交通工具造形設計上所需要之實務技能。本課程的目標將本於交通工具設計之跨領域先進知識與技術整合之精神，訓練對於交通工具設計有興趣之產品設計領域或車輛工程領域學生在造型設計進行之過程。故本課程將以實作為主，訓練學生如何掌握交通工具之造形並加以落實。課程內容涵蓋車輛外觀與內裝之設計圖與工程藍圖繪製、比例油土製作、FRP成型技術執行 (含模具與外殼) 等。學生更可以從課程中的產出獲得成就感。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of Vehicle styling practice. Based on the spirit of cross-discipline engineering, it integrates advanced styling knowledge and technique to fulfill student' passion on vehicle design. The contents include concept development, engineering blueprint, clay modeling and FRP mold and shell making. Students can also obtain achievement in the process.

notes: 四車三四.四創意三四和最後一哩合開,實習在綜科B05

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

name.en: Project for Medical Electronics Application Design

description.zh: 本課程運用跨領域專長整合共同設計開發醫療電子應用系統或服務內容包含:(1) 生醫檢測儀表系統設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：生醫檢測儀表系統概論、生醫檢測之光電設計實務、嵌入式系統之醫療儀表應用實務、無線網路與生醫儀表整合設計、醫療器材品質系統查驗實務(2) 睡眠感測元件設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：睡眠相關概念與其量測方法、可攜帶式睡眠監測硬體設計、演算法設計、睡眠感測後端資料整合系統開發(3) 無線健康整合服務系統應用於失智老人之照護RFID 室內安全監控系統、RFID戶外安全監控系統、GPS-GSM戶外安全監控系統、警急救援軟體平台
description.en: This course integrates interdisciplinary expertise to design for medical electronics applications and services, and the contents are as follows.(1) Biomedical instrumentation system design and implementationTopics include: introduction to biomedical instrumentation system, design practices for biomedical optics, application practices for embedded medical instrumentation, integration design of wireless networks and biomedical instrumentation, and quality inspection practices for medical devices(2) Sleep sensing component design and implementationTopics include: sleep-related concepts and their measurement methods, hardware and algorithm design for portable sleep monitoring system, and system development for sleep sensing back-end data integration (3) Integrated wireless health care service systems for elders with dementiaTopics include: RFID indoor security surveillance system, RFID outdoor security monitoring system, GPS-GSM outdoor security monitoring system, and software

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

name.zh: 精巧型電源轉換積體電路設計
name.en: Smart Power Conversion Integrated Circuit Design

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 介紹 2. 被動元件 3. 功率開關 4. 直流-直流電源轉換 5. 偏壓電路 6. 運算放大器 7. 參考電路 8. 邏輯控制電路 9. 電流感測電路 10. 保護電路 11. 頻率補償 12. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of smart power conversion integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of smart power conversion integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Passive components 3. Power switches 4. DC-DC power conversion 5. Bias circuits 6. Operational amplifiers 7. Reference circuits 8. Logic control circuits 9. Current sensing circuits 10. Protection circuits 11. Frequency compensation 12. Case study

name.zh: 積體電路佈局設計實務
name.en: Integrated Circuit Layout Design and Implementation

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與電路的差異2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.輸入/輸出焊墊的介紹7.電感的佈局8.射頻電路的佈局9.電流鏡的佈局10.鎖相迴路的佈局11.雙級運算放大器的佈局12.交換電容分器的佈局13.低雜訊放大器的佈局14.數位類比轉換的佈局15.類比數位轉換器的佈局
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of integrated circuit layout. Therefore, the student has the design capability of integratd circuit layout. The contedts of this course:1.Differences between layout and circuit 2.CMOS layout style 3.R、C layout.4.Analog cell layout 5.Analog floor plan 6.I/O pad layout issue 7.L Layout 8.RF circuit layout 9.Current mirror layout 10.PLL layout 11.Two stage OPA layout 12.Switched capacitor integrator layout 13.LNA layout 14.D/A layout 15.A/D layout

notes: 四子四甲乙和電子學程合開,每班限20人

name.zh: 數位積體電路後段設計

description.zh: 此課程之目標為前瞻性數位積體電路後段設計流程整合實務, 可訓練學生熟悉使用晶片設計流程, 以完成晶片後段設計之實務。課程內容包含:1. Design Flow Overview2. RTL Design in Verilog3. Basic placement & routing4. Post Layout Simulation5. LVS & DRC & ERC6. Time-Mill and Power-Mill Post Layout Simulation7. Module Compiler8. Physical Compiler9. Clock Tree Synthesis, Zero Skew Routing10. Scan Chain Optimization/Reordering11. Constraint driven placement &routing12. Buffer/wire sizing13. Cell library creation 14. Verilog code design15. Pre_simulation16. LVS & DRC & ERC Flow17. Time-Mill and Power-Mill Post Layout Simulation Flow18. Design examples19. placement &routing flow
description.en: This course is trained the student to understand back-end IC design flow.Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced IC. The contents of this course:1. Design Flow Overview2. RTL Design in Verilog3. Basic placement & routing4. Post Layout Simulation5. LVS & DRC & ERC6. Time-Mill and Power-Mill Post Layout Simulation7. Module Compiler8. Physical Compiler9. Clock Tree Synthesis, Zero Skew Routing10. Scan Chain Optimization/Reordering11. Constraint driven placement &routing12. Buffer/wire sizing13. Cell library creation14. Verilog code design15. Pre_simulation16. LVS & DRC & ERC Flow17. Time-Mill and Power-Mill Post Layout Simulation Flow18. Design examples19. placement &routing flow

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.射頻技術發展2.射頻接收機架構簡介與分析3.射頻發射機架構簡介與分析4.增益鏈路預算5.雜訊鏈路預算6.非線性效應之分析與計算7.鎖相迴路設計與分析學生能從這門課學習到射頻收發模組的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.Development of RF Technology2.Introduction and Analysis of RF Receiver Architecture3.Introduction and Analysis of RF Transmitter Architecture4.Analysis of Gain Budget5.Analysis of Noise Budget6.Analysis and Calculation of Non-linearity Effect7.Analysis and Design of RF Phase Lock LoopThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF transceivers from this course.

description.zh: 1.軟體工程簡介 2.專案規劃 3.系統需求分析 4.系統設計方法 5.程式設計方法 6.程式與系統測試 7.系統維護方法
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Projest Planning 3.Requirements Analysis 4.System Design 5.Program Design 6.Program & System Testing 7.System Maintenance

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

name.zh: 生醫植入晶片系統實務
name.en: Special Projects on Biomedical Integrated System

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生對於生醫植入晶片在實務上的設計與應用。利用晶片植入系統擷取動物的生理參數或用以治療疾病，瞭解生理參數所代表的意義，以及設計新的生醫晶片系統架構來提昇目前的醫療技術。
description.en: The object of this course is to provide students for learning the special projects on Biomedical integrated system. Using the system to capture the animals' physiological parameters or to treatment diseases, and understand the meaning of these physiological parameters. Moreover, some techniques can be developed for improving the existing technologies.

notes: 期中考後上課時間為星期一5678

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供生醫晶片之基本知識 ，及生醫晶片電路設計之設計方法。課程內容首先介紹生醫晶片的發展現況，及如何利用微機電製程及CMOS相容製程來感測生醫訊號，接著介紹用來處理生醫訊號的前段類比電路，及之後數位類比轉換電路。最後再介紹如何利用無線電路及可植入式的介面作訊號之傳遞，而形成一完整之生醫晶片電路。
description.en: The object of Bio-Medical Circuit Design is to introduce the basic Bio-Medical knowledge and train students design the Bio-Medical circuit. The course will first introduce the development of the Bio-Medical chip and MEMs process. It also includes Low Noise Analog Front-End Circuit, ADC, Implantable interface circuit and Low Power Wireless Circuit design.

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.散射參數與網路分析儀2.頻譜儀介紹3.自動化量測4.平面化傳輸線5.射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配6.積體電路封裝7.射頻耦合器8.射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 互動式娛樂服務之音訊處理技術
name.en: Audio Signal Processing for Interactive Entertainment Services

description.zh: 本課程講述音訊處理技術之理論與實務，並著重於互動式娛樂服務之應用。理論部分包括聲音訊號的分析與辨識、電子音樂的產生、內涵式音樂檢索原理、以及空間音場等問題介紹。透過實際應用的探討，使學生獲得理論知識與設計創意。實務部分則以卡拉OK服務平台為核心，於課後作業及期末專題實作中，藉由軟體模擬、DSP開發平台、與手持行動裝置的程式設計，使學生應用電子音樂技術、音樂檢索技術、與空間音場原理來實現一卡拉OK系統，突破一般居家或手持行動裝置的功能限制，提升歌唱情境。
description.en: The course is designed to equip students with knowledge and skills in audio signal processing, particularly in the applications of interactive entertainment services. It covers both theory and practice of audio signal analysis and recognition, electronic music production, content-based music retrieval, and spatial audio effects. Through the use of personal computers, DSP platforms, and handheld devices, students will learn to apply the audio signal processing techniques to the design of interactive karaoke services.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 本課程旨在使同學具體了解位於環太平洋地震帶之台灣，耐震安全對建築物之重要性；課程主要教授地震工程基本常識，以及耐震規範之靜力分析理論與台灣耐震工程現況等內容。
description.en: This course is aimed at making students realize the importance of seismic safety of buildings in Taiwan, which is located on Circum-Pacific seismic zone. The contents mainly include the fundamental topics of earthquake engineering, seismic design using static force regulated by building codes, and the practice and research on earthquake engineering in Taiwan.

name.zh: 全球行銷通路策略與管理
name.en: Global Marketing Channel Strategy and Management

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程、通路行為與通路策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in Channels Strategy. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, and channel strategy.

description.zh: 主要內容在介紹並探討變量間相互關係及建立模式的技術，討論的主題以財金實證研究中常用的分析模型為主，包括銀行效率的估算，隨機邊界法，資料包絡法，以及門檻值迴歸模型，分位數迴歸等。在資料包絡法的部分，在於探討如何以資料包絡分析進行績效評估的概念及方法，並提供合法完整版自由軟體供學生實地操作，本課程強調理論與實作並重，使學生除了熟悉理論之外，並落實於實際的運算，有助於未來的研究。
description.en: The main issue is to investigate and model the relationship between variables. Discussion topics are related to econometric skills frequently used in financial empirical studies, including banking efficiencies, stochastic frontier analysis, data envelopment analysis, threshold model, and quantile regression model. For data envelopment analysis, the purpose of this course is to let the students understand the basic theory, models, and applications of the data envelopment analysis. So that students will not only understand the theory but are also able to run the software and do calculations.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容綜合了組織設計與組織行為的重要議題，例如組織設計、領導統御、組織文化與氣候、政治行為、員工激勵、以及員工態度與情感等等。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of organization theory and organization behavior, including organization design, leadership, organizational culture and climate, political behavior, motivation, workplace attitudes and emotions.

name.en: Special topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源管理的各項重要研究議題，包括招募、甄選、訓練、績效評估、薪資管理、以及知識管理等。此外，本課程也將介紹諸多有關組織管理研究方法的議題。
description.en: This course introduces many research topics of human resource management, such as recruitment, selection, training, performance appraisal, compensation, and knowledge management. In addition, we will discuss many issues regarding the research methods in organization studies.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務決策時，會產生心理偏誤，進而做出不適當的財務決策。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其財務決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司理財的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc.

description.zh: 中文概述Chinese Description 	   本課程的授課目標為培育新一代設計師在交通工具造形設計上所需要之實務技能。本課程的目標將本於交通工具設計之跨領域先進知識與技術整合之精神，訓練對於交通工具設計有興趣之產品設計領域或車輛工程領域學生在造型設計進行之過程。故本課程將以實作為主，訓練學生如何掌握交通工具之造形並加以落實。課程內容涵蓋車輛外觀與內裝之設計圖與工程藍圖繪製、比例油土製作、FRP成型技術執行 (含模具與外殼) 等。學生更可以從課程中的產出獲得成就感。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of Vehicle styling practice. Based on the spirit of cross-discipline engineering, it integrates advanced styling knowledge and technique to fulfill student' passion on vehicle design. The contents include concept development, engineering blueprint, clay modeling and FRP mold and shell making. Students can also obtain achievement in the process.

notes: 四車三四.四創意三四和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 1.照明光源及燈具介紹：白熾燈、螢光燈、弧光燈、LED燈2.輻射度學、光度學、色度學之基本物理概念與單位3.照明光度學之量測方法與儀器介紹4.點光源之照度計算 5.多光源之平均照度計算 6.照度之品質與評價7.幾何光學：折射、反射、全反射、散射、材料色散、吸收、螢光激發 8.LED的發光原理與特性指標：顏色、效率、壽命、光形、光譜、熱散 9.白光LED的特徵：色溫、演色性 10.LED光源的封裝與二次光學透鏡
description.en: 1.(Lighting Luminaire: Incandescent Lamp, Fluorescent Lamp, High Intensity Discharge lamp, LED Lamp)2.concepts and Units of Radiometry/Photometry/Colorimetry3.Photometry Test Method and Understanding Test Report4.Calcuating Illuminance at a Point5.Average illuminance Calculation6.Quantity and Quality of Illumination7.Geometric optics8.Characteristics of LED 9.White light LED Characteristics: CCT and CRI10.Optical package and Secondary optics for LED

notes: 計網電腦教室,光電所和最後一哩合開,限30人

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類與其短脈衝產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to short pulse generation below one picosecond, ultrafast laser has been widely used in military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kind of the ultrafast laser、principle of mode-locked pulse generation、pulse compression technique and the method of ultrashort pulse measurement.  Various application of ultrafast laser including fluorescence measurement, pump-probe measurement and nonlinear optics measurement has also been included in this course.

description.zh: 本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。(1)課程簡介(2)斜向沉積技術技術(3)光學非均向薄膜(4)等效介質理論(5)表面電漿理論 (6)長程表面電漿 (7)超穎材料 (8)完美抗反射與波板 (9)感測技術 (10)仿生薄膜 (11)偏極態量測 (12)橢圓偏光儀
description.en: The topics of this course will focus on optical properties of nanostructured thin films. The discussed nanostructures are made of common used dielectric and metal coating materials. Many novel applications including perfect antireflection, polarization converter, beam splitters, and perfect waveplate will be introduced here. Furthermore, deposited metamaterial thin films are developed based on local plasmon effect within the metal-dielectric composite films. This course involves design, fabrication and measurement. The students should have learned and passed the course.(1) Introduction (2) Oblique angle deposition (3) Optical anisotropic thin films (4) Effective Medium Approximation (5) Plasmonics (6) Long range surface plasmon (7) Metamaterials (8) Perfect antireflection and waveplate(9) Sensing technique (10) Bioinspired and biomimetic thin films (11) Polarization measurements (12) Ellipsometry

notes: 需先修光學薄膜設計與應用課程及格者,始可選修。

description.zh: 本課程介紹金屬材料物理與化學性質、包括 (1) 原子結構 (2) 鍵結理論 (3)分子軌域 (4) 貴重金屬之光譜、反應與機構，以及 (5) 有機金屬材料之製備與催化。
description.en: This course contents the following subjects for metallic materials: (1) atomic structure (2) simple bonding theory (3) molecular orbitals (4) Electronic spectra, reactions, and mechanisms of precious metals (5) preparation of organometallic materials and their catalysis.

name.zh: 國際專業證照實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本國際專業證照實務講座課程針對國內外國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照MOS-PowerPoint 與MOS-ACCESS考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四管三.經管所和最後一哩合開,限45人,五567節

name.en: Database System and Database System and Applications

description.zh: 資料庫系統與應用課程的目的在研習資料庫設計與管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：資料庫管理系統架構、關聯式資料模式、關聯式資料庫設計理論、關聯查詢最佳化、關聯式資料庫管理系統：以MS SQL Server為例，以實務性方式，培養學生對資料庫系統設計開發之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to study the techniques of how to design and manage a database system. The topics contained in this course are: database system structure, relational database, E-R model, relational database design, query optimization, relational database management system-MS SQL Server etc. After studying this course, students should be able to design databases and manage database systems.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-創造力提升就業力

description.zh: 畢業後如何挑選工作及通過面試是學生須要面對的重大挑戰，但有許多畢業生因未做好職涯規畫，於面試時未能充分展露自己的優勢，因而喪失不少寶貴的工作機會。畢業生除須面對國內的競爭者，還須面對全球各地人才的激烈競爭。根據調查，是否擁有「傑出的專業能力」、「優良的溝通表達能力」、以及「良好的面試臨場反應」，將是能否獲得工作機會的重要關鍵。有鑑於此，為協助學生提早瞭解職場生態，進而強化其就業競爭力，此課程將廣邀業界高階主管與經理人，就職涯規畫、人才條件、面試重點、工作倫理、以及企業管理經驗等課題進行一系列的分享及互動討論。
description.en: Choosing a job that fits one's ambition is a challenge for most graduates. Unfortunately, many graduates may easily lose their job opportunity due to the lack of skills during interviews and proper career planning. Nowadays, graduates are facing global competitions. As reported by research and surveys, "excellent expertise", "good communication skills", and "prompt response during interviews" are three crucial keys for graduates to obtain a job. To enhance students' competitiveness in employment, this course invites business leaders and managers to share their experiences in their career and to have conversations with students on topics including career planning, personnel requirements, interview skills, job ethics, etc.

notes: 四電四甲乙丙.電機所和最後一哩合開,限160人,三ABC

name.zh: 就業達人講座-創造力提升就業力

description.zh: 在面對全球平均每一天誕生7.8個新科博士、平均每小時產出6.5個碩士及平均每分鐘製造0.7個大專生的高學歷高就業競爭環境下，台灣1111人力銀行公佈調查指出，87%的台灣應屆大學畢業生擔心畢業即失業，較去年增加約10%，企業主要招聘以積極度為首要考慮，比率為50.89%，技能專業證照居次，表達能力、履歷陳述方式、畢業科技、應對進退禮儀、外語能力及實習經歷等也受到重視。如何提昇學生就業能力，將成為學校培育人才的重要課題。　　就業達人講座配合最後一哩課程開設，於課堂中以模擬面試等議題來強化同學就業知識；面對激烈的人才競爭環境，必須不斷充電，提高競爭力，也要聰明掌握工作時間與效率的方法，職場不僅要會『做事』更要會『做人』才能在職場上如魚游水，讓你成為未來職場大贏家！
description.en: This course is designed to foster a student's ability to effectively communication skill, time management, pressure management, interview and the planning of the career by the human resources personnel and executives in the distinct industries to promote students the power of career competitive. Being able to effectively communicate is a skill that enhances many areas in life. In a job interview, clear communication is of the utmost importance, as employers are looking for people who can seamlessly fit into an existing setting and perform well under pressure. For today's world is full of competition, everyone is trying to outpace others in the race. Students need to face competitors from all over the world. If students need to succeed in a world full of competition. They will need deeper learning to succeed in college and prepare for careers. Therefore, these courses will benefit students in the long run.

notes: 四電四甲乙丙.電機所和最後一哩合開,三ABC

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生熟悉零售策略的基本概念，了解目前的零售產業之環境分析及零售趨勢之分析，探討零售行銷之區隔與定位，進而將零售策略如何應用於管理理論與實務分析。零售業包含百貨業、連鎖店、超市、超商等，與人們的關係極切，本課程主在探討如何經由零賣出使顧客滿意的商品。 內容：零售業概論、配銷通路、行銷研究、產品管理策略、定價策略、促銷策略、賣場規劃、零售業經營策略、顧客滿意1.具備零售管理學相關知識與概念。2.掌握零售業環境與趨勢之分析能力。3.具備零售業行銷區隔與定位的分析能力。4.具備零售策略應用於理論與實務之分析能力。
description.en: This masters-level course is designed to provide the student with a deeper understanding of retailing strategic management. Topics include: the world of retailing, electronic and no store retailing, the retail customer behavior, retail market strategy, retail location, merchandise management and store management. Retail management is mainly to discuss to sell goods through channels and satisfy them. The content of the course: Retail concept, physical distribution, market research, product management strategy, pricing strategy, promotion strategy, retail strategy and customer satisfaction.

description.zh: 廣告策略與企畫為廣告之進階課程,學生需結合行銷,廣告,創意,消費者心理及行為等領域之知識,並具備優秀之企畫能力,為所指定之企業,產品或理念規畫完整之整合行銷傳播企畫案。
description.en: nternational Advertising and Media Strategy takes a market-oriented approach to the total campaign. The course interrelates planning, creative and technical skills with emphasis on problem-solving and marketing communications.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生初步認識何謂「核子工程」，並提供相關知識。修習內容主要包括：(1) 國際核能發展方向與趨勢，(2)核反應之基本原理，包括衰變、鏈鎖反應、分裂與融合、等，(3)各類型核電廠之基本原理、(4) 核廢料處理，(5)輻射對於生活與環境之影響。
description.en: This course provides our students first knowledge in "Nuclear Engineering". Basic material and concept to be covered are: (1) The trend and potential of International Nuclear Power; (2) Introduction to nuclear reaction; (3) Design principles of various nuclear reactors; (4) Radioactive Waste Disposal; (5) The effect of radiation to our life and environment.

notes: 四機三甲乙丙合開,限50人

description.zh: 本課程內容主要希望讓學生認識「核輻射」及其安全與防護。修習內容將包括：輻射與物質作用、輻射度量與劑量、輻射防護與安全、輻射防護法規、核能安全之設計、放射性廢棄物處置、輻射的化學效應和生物效應、基本醫學影像技術-- X射線攝影、核磁共振、正子掃瞄。
description.en: The goal of this lecture hopes to offer students the knowledge in "Nuclear Radiation". It mainly includes: Interaction between matter and radiation; Radiation measurement and dosimetry; Radiation protection and safety; Regulation of radiation protection; Design in Nuclear safety; Radioactive waste management; Chemical and Biological effects by radiation; Basic introduction to medical imaging: CT, NMR, PET.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-新興亞洲市場泰國篇2
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Thailand2

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協五國經濟成長迅速，本課程將以泰語教學為主，泰國經貿、觀光文化及泰語字母韻母教學，讓學生在學習泰語的同時，深入了解泰國文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their history, culture, society and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

notes: 四英二和最後一哩合開，限50人,一ABC

description.zh: 此課程之目的為介紹有關隧道工程之理論、設計與施工技術。其內容包括：緒論、初步分析與設計考慮因素隧道施工與設計、挖道開發方式、隧道鑽孔配置、隧道爆破作業、臨時性支撐方式、隧道與地下結構物載重分析、隧道測量、隧道之維修、管理與保養。
description.en: The objectives of this course is to introduce tunneling engineering and excavation related theory, design and construction techniques, excavation, drillholes pattern design, blasting design, temporary support methods, stress analysis, surveying and tunnel maintenance and management.

notes: 四材三四和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程採分組進行，教師就個人專業在「文化事業」相關領域中提出專題教學規劃，由學生選擇組別，參與研習並進行實地演練。每組六人以上，計2-4組，透過分組，以拓展學生學習範疇，因應不同學生不同的興趣與需求。上課時間機動地結合參訪、實作、活動參與等，課程結束後必須以展演、競賽方式發表成果。
description.en: In the course, students will be divided into several groups, and according to teacher's instructional planning which is related to the fields of "culture", students can choose one group to participate and exercise practical training. In order to expand students' learning category and conform to each student's interest and requirement, there will have 2 to 4 groups in this course, and more than six students in one group. Teachers will combine visit, actual operation and active participation in the course. Students will have an achievement publish at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 概論，飛行器介紹，飛行空氣動力學，飛行運動方程式，穩定性與控制，旋翼空氣動力學，旋翼機控制，穩定與控制係數，各軸項之運動分析，控制響應，飛行自動控制設計與分析。
description.en: Introduction, Review of Flying Vehicles, Aerodynamics of Flight, Equations of Motion, Stability and Control, Rotor Aerodynamics, Control of Rotorcraft, Stability and Control Derivatives, Motion Analysis, Control Response, Design and Analysis of Automatic Flight System.

name.en: Civil Engineering Colloquy on Special Topics b

description.zh: 土木專題特論乃透過國際學者的講課，讓學生學習土木相關領域的重要知識及了解最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
description.en: This course will provide important knowledge and information regarding to the latest development or application on the field of civil engineering. Speakers being invited are well-known international scholars in the related area.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

notes: 請選博雅選修(二)-社會向度

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

notes: 請選博雅選修(四)-自然向度

description.zh: 螢光材料已經應用到很多的領域，如顯示器，照明，醫療，太陽能電池等，因此，本門課程將講解螢光發光現象與螢光材料的原理、應用及製造技術。另外將特別介紹顯示器與照明領域的當前的形勢和未來發展願景。
description.en: Luminescent materials have been applied to a lot of fields such as emissive displays, lighting, medicine, solar cells, etc. Therefore, this course explains principles, applications and fabrication technologies of luminescence   phenomena and materials. Especially, present situation and future prospect of displays and lighting will be introduced.

notes: 中西洋一郎教授,周二678節和周三234節上課

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師辛法春,北大三峽校區文學院4F06博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師賴賢宗,北大三峽校區文學院4F07博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師鍾隆琛,北大三峽校區社科院1F08博雅選修哲學

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.zh: 國際觀培養- TOP20台灣國際品牌
name.en: Feast for the global perspective -TOP20 Taiwan Global Brand

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關之營運情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括： 一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫 二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展 三、 都市計畫的先驅著 四、 戰後規劃的開創 五、 國土與區域計畫 六、 都市與都市區域計畫 七、 歐美的都市計畫 八、 未來聚落的都市規劃。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including: 1. Planning, planners and plans 2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940 3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from 1880 to 1945 4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from 1940 to 1952 5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990 6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to 1990 7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945 8. Settlements into the 21st century.

description.zh: 1. 明暸現代在不同產業下的現代服務事業。2. 應用理論於現實情境。3. 並提出創新設計的方案。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Service and Innovation Management. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Service Innovation; Service Management; Innovation Management and New Service Development.

description.zh: 首先對銲接熱源，輸入熱、熱傳導、化學反應、殘留應力生成等與銲接冶金相關的基本起源作一介紹，再以鋁合金、鎳基合金、碳鋼、合金鋼、不銹鋼為例，分別從銲道融溶區、部分融溶區，到熱影響區學習銲接製程導致的冶金現象。主題包括固化組織、晶粒結構、次晶結構、相變態、偏析、固化裂紋、熱裂紋、再加熱裂紋、氫脆、再結晶熱處理性等。
description.en: At the beginning, this course makes an introduction to the related source of welding heat source, input heat, heat transfer, chemical reaction, residual stress and welding metallurgy, moreover, it examplifies aluminum alloy, nickle alloy, carbon steel, alloy steel and stainless steel to describe metallurgical phenomenon from weld fusion zone and partial fusion zone to the welding process which is influenced by heat energy. Its main subjects include solidification, crystal structure, second particle structure, phase deformation, segregation, solidified cracks, hot check, reheat check, hydrogen embrittlement, recrystallization, heat treatment property, etc..

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹排程理論的最新議題，使學生學習最新排程理論、排程方法，並對排程在特定實務問題的應用進行深入的探討。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the recent and advanced topics on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the advanced methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects for a special topic.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.
